title: Support ticket page shows a ticket I submitted over three years ago, I made this account a week ago.
body: I was checking the page that shows the status of your support tickets to see if one I sent a few days ago had been resolved and saw another support ticket in the list. I was dated over three years ago and was resolved but I made this account around a week ago so I don't understand how or why it is there.

replies.body: Hmm, that's pretty strange!  I can't really say for sure, but our account team could take a look and check.  I can't really think of anything, except maybe using a previously used email address.  Hit them up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  and we'll check it out with you directly.
